channel.title: Help with when i die?
channel.description: When you on my 317 p server a "DEATH" AKA GRIM REAPER TYPE GUY, appears and just stands there and never goes away, how can i take him out or add it so he dissapears after like 10 seconds. I know its in my client.java but where, also whats is deaths npc code if possible?

item.title: Help with when i die?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

he’ll usually say a messag, if he does then search for that message and you’ll probably find the npc ID near it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with when i die?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Search for his ID and remove contents of him.

Read full topic
